title: Sett Passive Punches are Wrong
body:
What poopoo for brains designed his passive?
Everyone knows that the lead hand punch is much faster but the rear hand punch is slower but has much more of an impact as it travels farther. So if his passive was gonna be accurate it would be first punch really fast and second punch normal speed but does bonus damage.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=K9ScarletWeaver,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4I4e4wW6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-01-14T21:16:44.560+0000)
>
> it’s a 1-2

Yes do a 1-2 and see which hand hits faster. The only time the 2 would be faster is if you lead with a rear hand punch but that is pretty rare and unorthodox in any form of fighting. The idea is you set up with a quick jab/feint and then rock em with the artillery of the rear hand.
Maybe they'll retcon it with a comic that says he has hextech or something.
Punch out was also a game but they did it right
it's also a video game and not real life
Guess the one that made it up never watched boxing at all, cause Mike Tyson's 2nd punch is the knock out one
